creditline: Gift of John Taylor and Rachel McNamara
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: dagger; rather wide tapering blade with four pairs of small holes flanking a raised rib; wood handle with tapered wedge shaped top decorated with row of metal brads and vertical row of brads on one side; grip wrapped with metal wire; area of handle attachment to blade is triangular shaped hammered copper-colored metal; brownish patina overall
title: Blade
